import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link, BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, withRouter, HashRouter, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' class ExplArticle extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { nomArticle: '', poids: '', prixUnitaire: '', prixKg: '', selectedFamilleArticles: '', sousArticles: '', articlesDuCompose: [] } } componentDidMount() { let id_article = this.props.location.state.id_article; axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + 'Back_agora/GetArticleById.php?id=' + id_article).then(res => { console.log(res) this.setState({ idArticle: res.data[0][0].id_article, nomArticle: res.data[0][0].nomArticle, poids: res.data[0][0].poids, prixUnitaire: res.data[0][0].prixUnitaire, prixKg: res.data[0][0].prixKg, selectedFamilleArticles: res.data[1][0].label, articlesDuCompose: res.data[3] }) let sousArticles = res.data[2] let long = sousArticles.length let articlesSous = '' for (var j = 0; j < long; j++) { articlesSous += sousArticles[j].nomSouarticle.toString() + "," } let tousSousArticles = articlesSous.substr(0, (articlesSous.length - 1)) this.setState({ sousArticles: tousSousArticles }) }) } render() { return (

Informations article

{/* /.col-lg-12 */}
{/* /.row */}
{this.state.articlesDuCompose != '' ? (
{this.state.articlesDuCompose.map(el => )}
Article Quantité Unité Prix
{el.nomArticleDuCompose} {el.quantiteDuCompose} {el.nomUniteDuCompose} {el.prixDuCompose}
) : (null)}
); } } export default ExplArticle;
